title._content: Image taken from page 141 of 'Arctic Experiences: containing Capt. George E. Tyson's ... drift on the ice-floe, a history of the Polaris expedition, the cruise of the Tigress, and rescue of the Polaris survivors ... Edited by E. V. Blake. [With plates.]'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Arctic Experiences: containing Capt. George E.
